title: Wellness Services | Traditional Chinese Medicine Cornerstone Healing
description: Our wellness services incorporate ancient healing techniques into the treatment of modern conditions. Healing and effective, we offer holistic, energy-based therapies.
cleaned_text: Wellness / TCM Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) is a holistic approach that dates back about 2,500 years. It incorporates both acupuncture and the use of Chinese herbs. The focus is on the interaction of all bodily systems to restore the health and well being of the whole person-body, mind and spirit. [Read more](https://www.cornerstonehealing.com/traditional-chinese-medicine) about TCM. Herbal Medicine Chinese herbal medicine is the world's oldest, continually practiced professional medicine. Its written history stretches back more than 2,500 years. Today, the use of Chinese herbs is one of the most popular and effective alternative therapies in the West. Chinese herbal medicine is a very personalized treatment Nutrition Counseling An unbalanced diet contributes to an unbalanced body. To strengthen the body's ability to heal and respond to Traditional Chinese Medicine, treatment can be combined with nutritional advice that helps a patient understand what foods are best for their individual body and what foods to avoid.
